page.title: 02HOUSES IN KENTON,NORTH BRENT
page.content: {RACHEL GUIDES US ROUND HER HOUSE } From the front door,we go down the hall.To the left is the living room;to the right the downstairs toilet.At the end,the kitchen.Upstairs to the right is the toilet and my bedroom.To the left two steps lead to the landing and my brother's room.In front of me is the spare room;to the left,the bathroom and my parents' room. {DESMOND'S HOUSE,AN ESTATE AGENT'S VIEW Freehold detached house for sale. Comprises:Large entrance porch with built-in cupboard to large square hall.Cloakroom and downstairs toilet; fully-fitted kitchen/breakfast room. Through drawing room and dining room. Landing with large airing cupboard. Five bedrooms with fitted cupboards. Tiled bathroom with shower.Gas central heating,double glazed,garage,garden with shed,burglar alarm system.
